transcript:
Agent: Hello, thank you for considering our company. My name is John, and I'm calling about our new smart home security system.
Customer: Oh, hi John. I did request some information about that. What can you tell me?
Agent: Our system includes a state-of-the-art camera, motion detectors, and a smart door lock. It's all controlled through an easy-to-use app.
Customer: That sounds interesting. How much does it cost?
Agent: The system starts at $999, but we're currently offering a promotion for $799.
Customer: That's still a bit pricey for me. What kind of support do you offer?
Agent: We offer 24/7 technical support and a 1-year warranty on all our products.
Customer: Okay, that's good to know. Can I get a demo of the system?
Agent: Absolutely, I can set up a demo at your convenience. Would you like me to come to your home or would you prefer to visit our showroom?
Customer: I think I'd like to come to the showroom. How soon can I schedule a visit?
Agent: How about this weekend? We're open from 10am to 5pm.
Customer: That works for me. What's the address of the showroom?
Agent: It's 123 Main Street, just downtown. I'll make sure to have a system set up for you to try out.
Customer: Great, thank you. I'm looking forward to it.
Agent: You're welcome. I'll see you this weekend then.
Customer: Sounds good. Bye.
Agent: Bye, have a great day.
